item.title: Resumé
item.description: Personal Highlights GoC Cloud Native Working Group Meetup Website Youtube Open Source involvement: Official Docker images (Drupal Alpine) Official Kubernetes Helm charts (NiFi, Kylo) Extensions to Azure ACS Engine (Chocolately) Core Maintainer of Drupal WxT 7⁄8 Drupal 7 WxT Drupal 8 WxT Technical Architect: Open Government Portal (Drupal 7⁄8) Statistics Canada Portal (Drupal 7⁄8) Education Honors, Bachelor of Computer Science, Carleton University // Minor in Psychology // September 2006 – August 2010
